title: Leap Dave Williams
description: Uptight lawyer Dave Williams turns into the real Leap Day William after an ice fishing trip gone awry.
quote: Nothing that happens on Leap Day counts!
altHero: Dave Williams looks in the mirror to see he’s sporting Leap Day William’s signature hat, mustache, and gills
alt1: Dave, still in his bathrobe, first sees the mustache and gills in the bathroom mirror
alt2: Andie MacDowell plays Dave’s concerned wife
alt3: Dave speaks on a cell phone by the ocean and in full Leap Day William garb
alt4: Dave yells as police load him into their car
